Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.6.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.6.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Atthyādi
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Atthyādi
230.
2885Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
2886Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (2)
2887Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (3)
2888Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
2889Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (2)
2890Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (3)
231.
2891Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajāto—  cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
2892Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. Sahajātā—  cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo…pe…  kāyaviññāṇasahagatā…pe… . Sahajātā—  cittasamuṭṭhānā…pe…  (paccayavārasadisaṃ paṭisandhipi pavattipi kātabbā sabbesampi pañhānaṃ.) Pacchājātā—  cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—  cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—  cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
2893Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajāto—  cakkhuviññāṇasahagato…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (3)
2894Natthipaccayena paccayo…  vigatapaccayena paccayo…  avigatapaccayena paccayo.
